p: I'm leaving Chicago, & heading for Wisconsin points. All looks very good. Will not know the complete outcome of it 'til somewhat later when appropriations for the new season have been made.
Sorry I couldn't see uncle Ottocar. Undoubtedly he now has a big weight to carry. Barron Collier having passed away etc.
Here's loads of love for you & everyone there!!
Please write, no later than Sun. or Monday to Madison, Wisconsin, general delivery.
